keyMoments.title: Crew Reunites at Sacrificial Altar
keyMoments.description: After being separated through various ordeals in Upper Yard, the entire Straw Hat crew reunites at the sacrificial altar, sharing their discoveries and planning their next move.
keyMoments.significance: The reunion allows the crew to pool their knowledge and discover the truth about Upper Yard and the City of Gold.

keyMoments.title: Decides to Steal the Gold
keyMoments.description: As a crew, the Straw Hats decide their goal for the arc: to steal gold from Shandora before returning to the Blue Sea.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the crew's primary objective for the remainder of the Skypiea arc.

keyMoments.title: Campfire Celebration
keyMoments.description: The crew celebrates their reunion by cooking and eating barbecued Sky Sharks around a campfire, sharing stories of their adventures.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew's strong bonds and their ability to find joy even in dangerous situations.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

members.joinCircumstances: Member of the Shandia tribe from birth

keyMoments.title: Launch Attack on Upper Yard
keyMoments.description: The Shandia warriors launch a full-scale assault on Upper Yard to reclaim their ancestral homeland from Enel and the Sky Priests.
keyMoments.significance: Initiates the major conflict of the Skypiea arc, representing the Shandia's 400-year struggle to reclaim their homeland.

jollyRoger.description: Not a pirate crew - tribal warriors
